basic.description: This three week course in year three is designed to broaden students' understanding of the role played by community agencies in health promotion and disease prevention. Students are assigned to a community health agency under the supervision of a preceptor. Students work as a team to assist the agency in fulfilling its goals.
basic.subject: BCC
basic.title: Community Medicine

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Satisfactory completion of all year-one and year-two curricula.
